about_the_game:
You thought neon lights, big hairdos and piles of snow were a thing of the past? Think again and get ready to go crazy in a world full of quirky characters, weird gadgets and above all fast-paced retro-aesthetic action! Scoop up some snowballs, take aim and fire at will!

Snow War is an FPS (First Person Snowball) Game! No blood is shed, but that does not mean the stakes are not real.



Find Power-Ups that protect you from your enemies or give you a game winning edge!



Arm your self with The Snowbow and other gadgets. They might be held together with gum and duct tape, but you will still be virtuall unstoppable! But beware: batteries run out eventually!



So what are you waiting for? Find your way in the blinding lights of the cities and lush pine forests, grab some power-ups to wreak havoc among your enemies and climb the scoreboard to earn your place as the undisputed champion of the snowfields!

Key features:
- Classic PvP FPS (First Person Snowball) action with up to 16 players
- Free-for-all and different Team fight modes
- Play Online or LAN
- Play offline against Bots
- Variety of different Power-Ups that alter the game
- Create a Custom server where you set the rules

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 4000 series or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2700X or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: In the cold of an arctic apocalypse the human race is stuck in the 80’s and the only thing left to do is sling snowballs at your friends and foes!
